message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $18000. It's truly one-of-a-kind and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Alice, your product seems great, but $18000 is a bit too steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $12000 for it.  Let me know if that's something we can work with.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12000 is simply too low for this unique product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $15000. This is a fair price that recognizes the value of the product while also being within your budget. Let's make this deal happen!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $15000 is still more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm sticking with my original offer of $12000.  If you're not able to accept that, I'm going to have to look elsewhere.
